text: [[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Infatuated[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\n"Matters of state? I care not to hear them today… or any day soon! My love..."\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from getting married][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nHe might be a better conversationalist if his mind wasn't always buried in his manuscripts and studies.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nHe is impartial and completely honest in all his dealings with his fellow man.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nThis man turns his wounds into wisdom.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nMore than stout-hearted and beyond intrepid, this natural-born warrior is afraid of nothing in this world.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nWhen this man speaks, people listen.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nThis man is quick to anger and even quicker to physical blows.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nIf there is an exploit in the system this man can be relied upon to figure that out.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nThese mad Christians command their own God to come down that they may eat him and drink his blood. And yet they call us heathens.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\nGod has given me two hands, one with which I receive and the other to give to others.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Personality[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- one level[[/rgba]]\\n"You do not know what to think so I'll teach you. Think yourself a baby."\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained when a noble is hired as a general or governor][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Warrior[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nTime and time again this man has shown his mettle in battle, complete with a laurel of scars to show for it.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Win battles decisively][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Warrior[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nBetter to reign in Hell than serve in Heaven. \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Capture a historically significant settlement.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nThis man not only commands but leads. His ferocity in battle is known by all.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Capture the capitals of major factions][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Warrior[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nNot afraid to bloody his knuckles or break a few ribs.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Fight battles and Survive Riots with Household Guard][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Tyrannical[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThe last temptation is the greatest treason: to do the right deed for the wrong reason.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Disloyalty and tyranny breed corruption][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Tyrannical[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nOne day, this will all be mine!\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Tyrannical[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nIt is better to be obeyed than to be loved.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nHis enemies fear him almost as much as his own subjects.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through the embrace of despotism][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Loyalty[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nStalwart and brave to his King, to the bitter end.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained by having 5 or more loyalty.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Loyalty[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThe better interests of the Kingdom are no longer this man's goals.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained by having 4 or lower loyalty.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Scholarship[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThere are some lessons only time and experience can teach.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained by having the Educated trait for many years.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nTruly a national treasure, when this man speaks the commoners listen.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Earned through governing the capital.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Scholarship[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThe keystone to a just society is a legal system which treats all fairly.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through training at the Court School.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Scholarship[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nA mind is a terrible thing to waste.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained by Tutoring your children][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:132:122:222:1]]Nobility[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nIn the mouth of the foolish is a rod of pride: but the lips of the wise shall preserve them.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged through a prosperous nobility.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:132:122:222:1]]Nobility[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThis man may one day be king... and he knows it too.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged through grooming your heir][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nInspired, accomplished, and beloved by his people, this ruler's exploits will live out through song for generations to come.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Earned by forming a great Kingdom.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:132:122:222:1]]Nobility[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nPatience and a finely strung bow are all this man requires to fill his plate.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged by the presence of hunting buildings and culture][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:132:122:222:1]]Nobility[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nIt is evident to all the high station into which this man was born.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Passed down through families and encouraged by Estates.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:183:180:179:1]]Magnate[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nNo one ever built a kingdom who couldn't negotiate a deal.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through smart politics, and made easier by governing the capital.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nFew traits in this world will win you so many friends as having an overabundance in wealth.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through political prowess governing the Capital.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:183:180:179:1]]Magnate[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nGreed, in all of its forms; greed for life, for money, for love, knowledge has marked the upward surge of mankind. And greed, you mark my words, will save our people.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged by permitting profiteering.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:183:180:179:1]]Magnate[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nWe have what it takes to take what you have. \\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged by setting high taxes.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nThose would fight against corruption must be impeccably clean themselves.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Earned through incorruptibility while governing the Capital.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:132:122:222:1]]Judge[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThe law is law and order is order, this man ensures their tenets will be promptly discharged.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained or lost through honesty in trials.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:132:122:222:1]]Judge[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThis fellow is even-handed and fair in all his dealings, which engenders respect.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through governing the Capital.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:132:122:222:1]]Judge[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThe living embodiment of high-mindedness and noble pursuits.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Grained through loyalty ][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"Her skin grants its wearer magical strength."\\n\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained while hunting][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"Glad to rid our Middle Earth of this foul beast."\\n\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained while hunting][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"We'll find this venerated Saint a new home."\\n\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from missions][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"I'm sure they have magical properties of some kind."\\n\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained while hunting][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:135:189:233:1]]Item[[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\n"I am not a wolf in sheep's clothing, I'm a wolf in wolf's clothing."\\n\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained while hunting][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:183:180:179:1]]Heathen[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThere is no life but to reave and sail for glory's sake.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through Seafaring Culture][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:183:180:179:1]]Heathen[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nAccept the universe as the Gods gave it to you. If the Gods wanted to give you something else, they'd have done it.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through Pagan Beliefs][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:183:180:179:1]]Heathen[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nHe still hears the Hammer of Thor in the thunder.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through diplomacy with the Vikings.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nWhen the red mist descends, God help this man's enemies.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through feats of inspired violence.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nWhen the red mist descends, God help this man's enemies.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through feats of inspired violence.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:183:180:179:1]]Heathen[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nWhere a beast would have claws, he was born with talent.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through legendary feats while hunting.][[/rgba]]
\\nThe command of a Kingdom's army is an honour, and gives one considerable sway in matters of politics.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through leading the Kingdom's largest army.][[/rgba]]
\\nLeading troops into battle is dangerous, but carries respect and authority.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through leading a small force into battle.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Politics[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nA close ally and even better friend. I would trust them with my life!\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through strong of the King's traits.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Politics[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nA warm individual in whom we can more or less confidently rely on.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through approval of the King's traits.][[/rgba]]
[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Politics[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nNeither here nor there.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through a neutral opinion of the King's traits.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Politics[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nWould never let an opportunity pass to cause the King to lose face in public. Annoying, but not treasonous.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through disapproval of the King's traits.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:150:82:76:1]]Politics[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nWe're no longer sure if they're even on our side.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through strong disapproval of the King's traits.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:3:103:126:1]]Faith[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nOnly the penitent man will pass.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through repentance for past sins. Encouraged through religious buildings.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nA devoutly-religious man, who has sworn to root out evil and corruption wherever it may be found.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged by promoting virtue and Christian piety.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:3:103:126:1]]Faith[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nIf the Kingdom of Heaven can ever be found on Earth, this man will be its mortar.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through political intrigue.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:3:103:126:1]]Faith[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nHappy to share his bread and his coin with those in need.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through distributing food Surplus.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Elder[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nWhen the Elderly among us passes, a whole library disappears.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through administrating Hunting buildings.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nA graceful and honorable old age is the childhood of immortality.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through political influence in old age.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Elder[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThe fruits of the Earth can be had if a man is patient enough and unafraid to toil in the sun.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through administrating Agricultural buildings.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Elder[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nNeither piercing swords nor hails of arrows shall keep me from serving my Lord.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained serving their lord as a general while young.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:133:207:144:1]]Elder[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nHe has the hearts of his subjects and they have his.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged by governing peacefully and prosperiously.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Brutish[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nBlessed are the peacemaker... after all other options have been thoroughly exhausted.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Encouraged by the use of violence for political means.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Legendary[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 100[[/rgba]]\\nThe purpose of torture is not getting information, it's spreading fear.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through repeated use of henchmen, assassinations and threats.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Brutish[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nNearly all men can withstand adversity, but if you want to test a man’s character, give him power.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained as an antipathy trait by disloyal, unprincipled characters.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:215:0:1]]Brutish[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nHe's not afraid to break a few eggs in the pursuit of his goals.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained through carrying out Massacres and leading Pyrrhic Victories.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nUnknown to the world, this man seeks to prove himself\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds have not escaped notice.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds have not escaped notice.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 2[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds have made him prominent within your Kingdom.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 2[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds have made him prominent within your Kingdom.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 2[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds have made him prominent within your Kingdom.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 3[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds are renowned throughout the Isles.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 3[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds are renowned throughout the Isles.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 3[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's deeds are renowned throughout the Isles.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 4[[/rgba]]\\nWhen they write the histories of these tumultuous years, the deeds of this man will consume whole chapters.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 4[[/rgba]]\\nWhen they write the histories of these tumultuous years, the deeds of this man will consume whole chapters.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 4[[/rgba]]\\nWhen they write the histories of these tumultuous years, the deeds of this man will consume whole chapters.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 5[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's name is spoken in every corner of the world and his deeds recorded in every legend of our times.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 5[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's name is spoken in every corner of the world and his deeds recorded in every legend of our times.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 5[[/rgba]]\\nThis man's name is spoken in every corner of the world and his deeds recorded in every legend of our times.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gain personal fame through Bards, Skalds, Scribes and other Followers.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nA man from such a family certainly has great things ahead of him.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from having a famous father.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nA man from such a family certainly has great things ahead of him.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from having a famous father.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 1[[/rgba]]\\nA man from such a family certainly has great things ahead of him.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from having a famous father.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 2[[/rgba]]\\nA man from such a family certainly has a lot to live up to.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from having a famous father.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 2[[/rgba]]\\nA man from such a family certainly has a lot to live up to.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from having a famous father.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 2[[/rgba]]\\nA man from such a family certainly has a lot to live up to.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from having a famous father.][[/rgba]]

[[rgba:255:153:51:1]]Fame[[/rgba]] [[rgba:104:104:104:1]]- level 3[[/rgba]]\\nThis man finds himself renowned, not for his own deeds, but for those of his kin.\\n[[rgba:104:104:104:1]][Gained from having a famous father.][[/rgba]]
